C

Character - Class in Player
Create a new Character representing the body the player will have control over, extending a Walker type to remain upright throughout the game.
Character(World) - Constructor for class Player.Character
Initialises objects for the main player body, setting their attributes at specific integer values when they first start playing the game
characterCollision - Class in BodyCollisions
Creates a new listener interface to enable the Character body to interact with specific bodies differently, from losing lives when colliding with enemies to destroying bodies that provide the player with an advantage.
characterCollision(Character) - Constructor for class BodyCollisions.characterCollision
Initialise a new CollisionListener for the Character
characterMovement - Class in PlayerCharacteristics
Create a new KeyAdapter interface that provides the player with the operation to control the character body in the game.
characterMovement(Walker, GameLevel, Game) - Constructor for class PlayerCharacteristics.characterMovement
Constructor that initialises the
CloudPlatform - Class in StaticBodies
Create a cloud platform in Level3 extending the attributes of the superclass Platform
CloudPlatform(World, float, float) - Constructor for class StaticBodies.CloudPlatform
Constructor method for the cloud platform extending attributes in the Platform class and providing additional attributes to the class.
collide(CollisionEvent) - Method in class BodyCollisions.AirEnemyCollision
Receives and responds to collisions where the AirEnemy records the collision event between platforms and inverting their speed to alter the direction of their travel.
collide(CollisionEvent) - Method in class BodyCollisions.characterCollision
Receive and respond to a collision event with an object i.e.
collide(CollisionEvent) - Method in class BodyCollisions.fireballCollide
Receives and responds to collisions where fireballs will roll on its own ability, falling downwards towards the ground which will reset the fireball's position elsewhere in the world and repeat
collide(CollisionEvent) - Method in class BodyCollisions.iceDemonCollide
Receives and responds to collisions when the IceDemon interacts with specific types of platforms, changing their directional movement every time a collision is record between a platform/boundary.
collide(CollisionEvent) - Method in class BodyCollisions.reaperCollision
Receives and responds to collisions when the Reaper interacts with specific types of platforms, changing their directional movement every time they collide with the wall.
collide(CollisionEvent) - Method in class StaticBodies.PortalListener
Method to create specific behaviours when the player collides with the portal body, verifying the player has completed the level objective and the body is of type Character.
createWorld(GameLevel) - Method in class PlayerCharacteristics.characterMovement
Mutator method used in conjunction with the loading method to parse the level number into the world
